extension.title: Simple image backup
extension.description: Automaticaly download images from posts to local server.
extension.author: om
extension.note: Server must have write access into 'img' folder inside extension. Otherwise download will fail.
After uninstall posts will still point to img folder of this extension. Keep this folder on the server otherwise you will break the links.
